SENT.plain: BACKGROUND: A spider monkey with severe dyspnea was referred to our clinic
METHODS AND RESULTS: Radiographs revealed an enlarged cardiac silhouette
Ventricular tachycardia and ST segment depression were also diagnosed after an ECG
These findings coupled with the postmortem examination confirmed dilatative cardiomyopathy
CONCLUSIONS: This case is worthy of presentation since dilatative cardiomyopathy has been rarely encountered in spider monkeys
